song.title: Western Comfort
song.info:
The song is a partial remix of the folk balad "The House of the Rising Sun", with "The Animals" version being the main source of inspiration..
"The Animals" version on Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bwAw9ThDQmk
Information about "House of the rising sun": http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_House_of_the_Rising_Sun
